# Discord Chat Analysis for ğŸ’»â”‚developers

## 1. Summary
The discussion primarily revolves around development tools and features for Hyperfy. A significant focus was on a keyboard implementation that Gh0sTt is working on, which appears to be built upon Starlight's existing keyboard with added functionality for individual key coloring. There was also discussion about Blender add-ons for Hyperfy, specifically regarding collision issues with animated skinned meshes. Two different Blender add-ons were mentioned: the official Hyperfy Tools (version 1.5.0) and another script created by Ash that's available in the source code. Gh0sTt mentioned plans to release repositories for both a bot and API they're developing. Future development plans discussed include making implementations mobile and VR friendly, with specific interest in utilizing phone gyroscopes for controller functionality and implementing gamepad API support for controllers.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Can animated skinned meshes have collision? (asked by Gert-Jan Akerboom) A: Try adding collisions manually as sometimes the plugin causes issues (answered by Valiant)
Q: Is there another blender addon? (asked by Gert-Jan Akerboom) A: Yes, in the source code - blender_addon.py and blender-exporter.md (answered by .hyp shaman)
Q: Will the keyboard implementation be mobile and VR friendly? (asked by 0mka) A: Yes (answered by PabloFM | Numinia)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Valiant | Helpee: Gert-Jan Akerboom | Context: Issues with collision on animated skinned meshes using Hyperfy addon | Resolution: Suggested trying to add collisions manually instead of using the plugin
Helper: .hyp shaman | Helpee: Gert-Jan Akerboom | Context: Looking for alternative Blender addons | Resolution: Shared links to blender_addon.py and blender-exporter.md in the source code

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Implement VR/raycasting for keyboard | Mentioned By: 0mka
Type: Technical | Description: Implement gamepad API for controller support | Mentioned By: 0mka
Type: Technical | Description: Implement phone gyro controls | Mentioned By: Gh0sTtğŸ‘»ğŸª„ğŸ˜
Type: Technical | Description: Release repositories for bot and API | Mentioned By: Gh0sTtğŸ‘»ğŸª„ğŸ˜
Type: Feature | Description: Add individual key coloring to keyboard | Mentioned By: Gh0sTtğŸ‘»ğŸª„ğŸ˜

# Discord Chat Analysis

## 1. Summary
This chat segment from the "âš¡â”‚general" channel contains minimal technical discussion. The conversation primarily consists of greetings, a request for moderator action against a user, a mention of a bounty posting for AI avatar creation, an inquiry about partnership opportunities, and a brief exchange about content creation and storage. There's a specific mention of potentially creating a "picker" that uses repository or Arweave storage, referencing work previously done by someone named Toxsam from Polygonal Minds who created numerous items. No detailed technical discussions, decisions, or problem-solving occurred in this limited chat segment.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Do you know if there is a setting that allows folks to actually just @tag the @mods Role? (asked by Agent12) A: There are settings but I think for simplicity we limited the ability for people to tag roles of any kind or so that was intent (answered by maximus)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: maximus | Helpee: Agent12 | Context: Request to ban a user | Resolution: Maximus confirmed the ban was resolved

## 4. Action Items
Feature: Consider creating a picker that uses repo/Arweave storage | Description: Suggestion to create a component similar to what Toxsam created | Mentioned By: Gh0sTtğŸ‘»ğŸª„ğŸ˜

# Analysis of ğŸª™â”‚hyper Discord Channel

## 1. Summary
This chat segment contains minimal technical discussion. The conversation primarily revolves around HYPER token price movements, with members discussing a recent price increase. One user mentions it might be related to Emirates announcing crypto payments for flights. There's brief mention of swing trading as a strategy during downturns. The chat also includes some moderation-related questions about pinging roles and dealing with an unspecified issue. One community member inquires about potential token buybacks using fees earned, but another user indicates this idea has been "resoundingly shot down" in previous discussions. Overall, this segment lacks substantive technical content or problem-solving discussions.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Any news about possible buy backs on token with fees earned? (asked by MUDBONE) A: The couple times ive seen buybacks raised the idea was resoundingly shot down so its unlikely any buyback will be entertained (answered by maximus)
Q: does at mods work? (asked by general hyper) A: No it actually doesn't for some reason. (answered by Agent12)

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Agent12 | Helpee: general hyper | Context: Trying to figure out how to ping mods | Resolution: Agent12 confirmed role pinging doesn't work and suggested tagging specific users instead

## 4. Action Items
Technical: None identified in this chat segment
Documentation: None identified in this chat segment
Feature: None identified in this chat segment

Gert-Jan Akerboom shared a brief update about progress on a modular building project. The message indicates that the building structure is taking form, and the next development step will be implementing collision detection or collision mechanics. Gert-Jan included a link to their personal website (akerboom.fyi) where the project can be viewed. The chat segment is very brief with only this single update message and no subsequent discussion or responses.
